name: SecurePush
overview:
Modern take on Identity Protection. SecurePush offers unique solution! How can service providers identify real users with complete certainty and avoid illegal remote access or fake actions performed with a stolen identity? SecurePush offers a unique, top safe, modern and extremely user-friendly anti-theft multi-factor identity authentication platform, based on in-house patented technology. It provides higher security than other hardware devices or OTP solutions, while offering much wider functionality. The system is specially designed to serve banks, credit card companies, e-commerce, social networks, cloud providers, internet routers and switches, sensitive websites and many more, while supporting the highest security standards and regulation demands of international financial systems. With simple installation, it allows customers to safely perform sensitive online or offline actions while eliminating the possibility of fraud or identity theft, whenever and wherever needed, simply via the user’s smart phone or any other smart device in their possession.

This unique system dramatically enhances existing security methodologies creating an efficient independent layer of authentication for all users. It simply runs on existing smart devices; there is no necessity for additional equipment or investment. No more need for tokens or other old fashioned devices!
